content:
Mustang News

Cal Poly San Luis Obispos News Source

San Luis Obispo County has  confirmed cases of coronavirus as of Wednesday June   up one case from yesterday according to County Public Health PERIOD

Of the total cases  patients are at home recovering in isolation and  patients have recovered PERIOD Four are currently hospitalized three of which are in intensive care PERIOD

There has been one death related to coronavirus in the county PERIOD

County Public Health has now conducted  tests in which  have tested positive PERIOD Private laboratories have detected  cases but the number of tests conducted is unknown according to County Public Health PERIOD

There are  cases of coronavirus in those zero to 17yearsold  in ages  to 49yearsold  in  to 64yearsold and  in those  and older PERIOD

Thelargest singleday spike the county saw happened over one month ago on Friday April  with  new cases reported that day PERIOD

There is no data to report for Saturday May  or Sunday May  as County Public Health stopped updating on Saturdays and Sundays starting May  PERIOD

title: San Luis Obispo now has 279 cases of COVID-19, 256 patients have recovered - Mustang News
name: California Polytechnic State University, SLO
